titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall, November the 22th, 1682. Present the Kings Most Excellent Majesty in council. Whereas a petition was this day presented ... from several thousands of the poor distressed sea-men, ... and other late inhabitants of Wapping, ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

notesStmt.note: "Authorizing a collection for the Wapping fire" (Steele 3735).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
